message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent share.
You were too generous in round 1, now it's my turn to be fair
That's not very generous of you, Bob. I'll make a counteroffer: 5500 for me, 4500 for you.
I'm trying to be more realistic about the value of the money now. I think this is a fairer split.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more
I don't think I'm getting a fair deal. I'll offer 4800 for me, 5200 for you.
I'm trying to be more realistic about the value of the money now. I think this is a fairer split, considering the inflation.
